name: Hexavoid 2
description:
Hexavoid 2 is the sequel to 2016's hit game, Hexavoid.

Choose your spaceship and try to survive in a full of obstacles, hostile world. If you are a fan of space shooting game and like annoyingly hard challenges, Hexavoid 2 will be your next addiction.

Collect power-ups to battle a variety of enemy ships and bosses. Upgrade your ship and unlock different stages and challenges.

FEATURES:
Endless random journey
25 challenging stages
Unlockable ‘impossible’ world
Upgrade your ships to increase their scoring potential.
Battle your friends' score with Game Center.
Download for FREE

Follow Twitter & Instagram: @nanovationlabs
